TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Llyung, title = Llyung, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Llyung} }

S.FORM: llyung llyung ga ggalan qulih na 'tayal. nanu yaqu llyung qani qu qzyunam uzi na 'tail.
llyong llyong ga ggalan qolih na 'tayal. nano yaqo llyong qani qo qzyonam ozi na 'tail.
